nodes.text: The Republic Power Generation was a region of the Upper Industrial Sector on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Republic made use of the area's generator facilities, and the Lenstrum Market and Outpost Shylon were located in the region.
The Republic Power Generation appears as part of the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
